block.p: Barbara Stuart Pillsbury, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Donaldson Clark Pillsbury of New York, was married yesterday to Ostrom Enders II, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Anthony T. Enders of New York. The Rev. Carleen R. Gerber performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church of Old Lyme, Conn.

The bride, 29, is known as Blair. She is a senior program associate at the Council of the Americas, an organization in New York that promotes trade in the Western Hemisphere. She graduated from Yale and received a master's degree in public affairs from Princeton.

Barbara Stuart Pillsbury, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Donaldson Clark Pillsbury of New York, was married yesterday to Ostrom Enders II, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Anthony T. Enders of New York. The Rev. Carleen R. Gerber performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church of Old Lyme, Conn.

The bride, 29, is known as Blair. She is a senior program associate at the Council of the Americas, an organization in New York that promotes trade in the Western Hemisphere. She graduated from Yale and received a master's degree in public affairs from Princeton.

Her father, who retired as a partner in the New York law firm of Davis Polk & Wardwell, is a senior vice president and the general counsel of Sotheby's, the auction house in New York. Her mother, Marnie Pillsbury, is the executive director of the David Rockefeller Fund, a foundation in New York.

The bride is a granddaughter of John S. Pillsbury Jr., a former chairman of Northwestern National Life Insurance Company in Minneapolis, now known as Reliastar Inc., and of Robert D. Stuart Jr., who retired as the chairman of the Quaker Oats Company in Chicago and later was the United States ambassador to Norway. She is a descendant of Charles A. Pillsbury, a founder of Pillsbury, the Minneapolis food company.

The bridegroom, 31, is known as Jack. He is an investment banking associate at Chase Securities in New York. He graduated from Trinity College in Hartford and received an M.B.A. from New York University. His father is the managing partner of Brown Brothers Harriman & Company, the investment bank in New York. The bridegroom's mother, Elizabeth Enders, is an artist. His grandfather Ostrom Enders was chairman of the Hartford National Bank & Trust Company, now part of Fleet Bank.
